short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FMovies - Download & Watch Movies From IMDb With FMovies Movie Download App

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FMovies download app injects streaming & download buttons into the IMDB website, allowing users to find streaming & movie download links. Stream with one click or download just about any movie you want without annoying ads or fear of installing some nasty program on your computer. With FMovies, you can safely stream or download without worry. Simply install the FMovies extension and find a movie on IMDB, the world's largest movie database. The buttons will be injected into the page, like seen in the screenshots below. Simply click to stream or download.
